channel.title: Help! I Vain I if ur reading this please reaad!
channel.description: right my server cant connect to my client. ive done EVERYTHING. portfowwarind works but idk why its not connect.

item.title: Help! I Vain I if ur reading this please reaad!
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Lets walk through the basics:

  • Are you sure your server port is opened? http://canyouseeme.org
  • Are you aware that even after the port is opened, if the client is on the same computer as the server it will still have to connect using localhost?
  • Clients sometimes have IP addresses in multiple classes (Gui, EGUI, Client); did you edit the right one?

Read full topic
